text.section: Unless a dealer's license is renewed for a 1-year term as provided in this section, a dealer's license expires on the first June 30 after its effective date.

section.section:
Before a dealer's license expires, the licensee periodically may renew it for an additional 1-year term, if the licensee:
is otherwise entitled to be licensed;
pays to the Secretary a renewal fee of $25, payable to the Comptroller; and
submits to the Secretary a renewal application on the form that the Secretary provides.
A refund or proration of the renewal fee is prohibited.
